data.title: State of Indiana House of Representatives
data.meta_description: The Indiana House Republican Caucus is the majority caucus of the Indiana House of Representatives & has 71 legislators, led by House Speaker Todd Huston.
data.text:
Thank you for allowing me to represent your voice in the Indiana General Assembly.

My Web page is an excellent tool for keeping track of what is happening at the Statehouse as well as pertinent issues impacting our community.

To represent you more effectively, I encourage you to contact me with your questions, concerns or suggestions on how we can improve our great state together.

It is truly an honor and privilege to represent you, and I look forward to your feedback.

Sincerely,

Jim Pressel

State Representative

House District 20

Indiana House of Representatives: 2016 - present

Committees:

Roads and Transportation (Chair)

Elections and Apportionment

Government and Regulatory Reform

House District 20: Portions of LaPorte and Starke counties

Address: 200 W. Washington St., Suite 401-3, Indianapolis, Indiana 46204

City: Rolling Prairie

Occupation: Small-business owner

Statehouse phone number: 1-800-382-9841

State Representative Jim Pressel owns and operates Pressel Enterprises Inc., a small business that builds and remodels residential homes throughout Northwest Indiana. He is an active member of the Indiana Builders Association and served as its president in 2016.

A Rolling Prairie resident for the last 30 years, Pressel is an active member of his community. In 2003, he helped start the building trades program at New Prairie High School and continues to serve on the board. This program gives students the opportunity to gain hands-on experience in building structures to prepare them with the skills needed for the workforce.

Pressel, born and raised in rural LaPorte County, is married to his wife, Rebecca, and they have two children and three grandchildren.
